Package pizza.foodItems

Class SudsOrder

java.lang.Object
pizza.foodItems.SudsOrder
All Implemented Interfaces:
pizza.services.Deliverable
public class SudsOrder extends Object implements pizza.services.Deliverable
This class represents a beverage order, referred to as "Suds," in the context of food service. It calculates delivery costs through the Deliverable interface, considering the quantity of items ordered.
